'That's crazy Anakin!' you reply 'You can't trust the word of an evil Sith! and beside your dreams only show one possible outcome of the future. You may be the cause of Padme death by following this evil course!'

'Stand aside Max! I don't want to kill you!'
He shouts
12112221211.title: With Anakin in the council chambers

choices: Use the force to through an object into Anakin's back
121122212111.content:
You lightsaber battle ranges far and wide over the council chambers, neither of you gaining an advantage. Anakin fights like a man possessed, desperate to do what he thinks is right to save his wife. You fight for the survival of the ~Jedi and to do what you think is right.

You are too closely matched to end the fight quickly, unless one of you gets lucky. You realise that you do not need ot defeat Anakin only delay him from interfering with the arest of the chancellor. You abandon any thought of attack and just stop Anakin from escaping the Council chambers, sinking deeply into the force. His attacks increase in ferocity and desperation. One wrong move could end the fight either way.

Suddenly your luck turns and you slip over onto one knee. Triumph in his eyes Anakin raises his lightsaber to strike you down.
121122212111.title: Fight in the Council Chambers

1211222121111.content:
You stab your yellow lightsaber upwards impaling Anakin upon it's fiery blade. He loks astonished before the light fades from his eyes.

You thumb your lightsaber switch allowing his body to fall to the ground and make all speed to the Chancellor's private chambers.When you get there you find an exhausted Mace Windu standing over a decapitatd Sith Lord. The republic is saved. You relate to the MAster what happened with Anakin and see acceptance in his eyes.

'We've lost a great Jedi today. But we could have lost our freedom. You did the right thing. Thank you'
1211222121111.title: Luck is what you make of it

1211222121112.content:
Anakin ducks the table you have thrown with the force and slices open your throat with a slash of his blue lightsaber.

You can only hope that your delay enabled Mace Windu and the other Jedi to defeat the Chancellor.....
1211222121112.title: Gamble with a table

121122212112.content:
'Anakin listen to me....'


Your words die as Anakin slices away your throat with his lightsaber and stabs you in the heart.
121122212112.title: Silence is Golden

choices: Allow him to attack Mace Windu
12112221212.content:
Anakin Skywalker must pay for his crimes but apprehending the Sith Lord is too important so you agree to accompany Mace Windu and another Jedi. On the way in the troop transport you fill the Master in on Anakin’s actions and behavior whilst under your observation.

‘Palpatine has used Anakin’s fears for his wife to turn him against the Jedi. I ordered him to remain in the council chambers until we return. If he obeys me we should be able to guide him away from the dark path.’

Mace Windu has a dreadful singularity of purpose as he brushes aside aides and functionaries as you make your way towards the supreme chancellors private chambers.

‘In the name of the galactic senate we are placing you under arrest chancellor Palpatine.’ Mace says as the three of you trigger your lightsabers.

‘Are you threatening me Master Windu?’ Taunts Palpatine as he suddenly ignites his hidden blood red lightsaber. He lets out a terrible cry and launches himself at you and your comrades. How did we miss a Sith of such power? You think as the other Jedi brought with you is stabbed through the heart by the Sith’s blade. You and Master Windu attempt to fall back to the corridor leading from the Chancellor’s study to his larger audience chamber. For a minute you face the Sith Lord alone one on one down the corridor. He is relentless, his rage could fill oceans. His mastery of the darker passions is beyond understanding. Fighting the urge to turn tail and flee you block stroke after terrible stroke. Finally as you back into the main reception one pieces your side and you fall gasping to the floor. As the Sith Lord stabs viscously downwards the purple blade of Mace Windu deflects it, saving you. Holding your bloodied side with your left hand you use the force to throw a cushioned seat at the Sith. He slices the bulky chair in two but before he can attack again you have regained your feet and have retreated out of range. Mace Windu steps between you and the chancellor and the Sith Lord attacks him with the unbelievable focused aggression of one knowledgeable in the dark side. Mace Windu falls back initially but then he gradually masters the Sith Lords attacks, countering the increasingly desperate strikes of his opponent with long powerful but controlled strokes, like those you saw him use against Anakin in the Sparring ring. One of those long strokes shatters the long transparent window letting in the raging wind of Coruscant’s atmosphere. The Sith Lord is on the retreat now, Mace Windu counters a viscous thrust from the ruby lightsaber and disarms the chancellors kicking him to the floor and pointing his purple lightsaber at Palpatine’s throat.
By this time you have lost a lot of blood and have collapsed into one of the other comfortable seats the Chancellor provides for his guests. You close your eyes using the force to close the wound in your side. When you open your eyes again it is to the terrible flicker of malignant electricity flying from the Senators fingers to the trembling lightsaber of Mace Windu, who is redirecting their terrible energies upon the now scarred face of his tormentor. Anakin stand between them and you looking from one of them to the other, unsure of what to do. He is oblivious to your presence.

‘Help Anakin’ The Chancellor implores ‘Can hold on much longer’ Electricity is all around him ‘It’s the only way to save Padme’
‘Don’t listen to him Anakin’ Windu cries against the wind. ‘I must finish him’ and as the electricity ceases raises his ling lightsaber for the final stroke.

‘No!’ Cries Anakin rushing forward, his own lightsaber lit.

You are too weakened to move swiflty.
12112221212.title: Arrest of the Chancellor

121122212121.content:
You throw your yellow lightsaber at Anakin, gritting your teeth to hold it steady with the force. The shimmering blade cuts deeply into Anakin's back killing him instantly. Master Mace Windu decapitates Darth Sidous with a powerful blow. The Sith Lord's head tumbles out into space, and falls from view. As it falls the head lets out a terrible scream carried to your ears by the wind.

Supported by Mace Windu you make your way back to the Jedi Temple to receive medical attention. In time you will make a full recovery. Mace Windu takes you to your quarters. Just before you fall into a deep Jedi Healing Trance Mace Windu speaks. His words are the last thing you remeber before you fall asleep.

'The Jedi and I personally owe you a great debt of gratitude. Do not let it trouble you that you had to strike down Anakin. For evil to triumph, only requires that good men do nothing. And you are a good man and a Jedi.'

When you awaken the rest of the Jedi Council has returned from their various missions and the Galaxy is now, largely at peace. Now that Darth Sidous and his apprentice are dead the Darkside no longer taints the force and the Jedi are coming to realise just has close to the abyss they had come. One wrong step and the machinations of the Sith Lord would have come to fruition, the Jedi would be dead and he would reign as Emperor.

You are awarded a seat on the coucil Master Max Raven and go on to become one of the most powerful, and good Jedi the galaxy has ever seen, keeping peace and order in the Republic.

THE END
121122212121.title: A New Era

121122212122.content:
You are just too tired to stop Anakin.

Anakin slices Mace Windu's hand off, preventing him from killing the Sith. With a cackle of delight Palpatine flings the Master out into the open air with a powerful bolt of lightning.

Then they turn to you. The last thing you see is purle and blue bolts of evil energy coursing between the new Emperor's fingertips and your already damaged body.

THE END.
121122212122.title: Apathy's End

choices: Agree to Set a Trap for the Jedi
1211222122.content:
The Padawans are no match for Anakin and yourself, the two most talented Jedi of your generation. Within a minute they all lie dead on the stony floor of the chamber. You feel powerful, unstoppable.

‘The Chancellor will be pleased’, says Anakin ‘Let us go and report to him’
The Chancellor is very pleased that have destroyed a threat to the republic. ‘Well done my friends, you have done me a great service. Come walk with me’

The supreme Chancellor walks out of his office into an anteroom with twisted statues adorning the walls. Following him with Anakin you feel a tremor in the force.

‘You two have tremendous potential in the force, and I fear it will never be fulfilled at the Jedi Academy.’

‘You know the ways of the force?’ You and Anakin exclaim together.

‘Yes, I learnt much of the force from my Master..’

Realisation hits you and you draw your lightsaber. Anakin does likewise. ‘You are the Sith Lord we have been searching for?’ you say incredulously.

‘Are you going to kill me?’ The Sith Lord replies. ‘Anakin, you know that together we can laugh at death and stop those we most love from dying. Would the Jedi teach you that? Can they? And Jedi Raven, will you stand aside and allow Anakin to become the greatest Jedi the galaxy has ever known under my tutelage? Did you not enjoy striking down our enemies? If you with to be truly unstoppable you must learn from all sides of the force, not just the narrow aspect the Jedi teach!’

Palpatine’s words ring in your ears. You want all that power so badly. But can you really betray the Jedi who’ve taught you since you’ve been a small boy?
1211222122.title: Temptations of the Sith

12112221221.content:
You cannot turn down the chance of all that power. You must have it all. You and Anakin agree to set a trap for the Jedi.

Returning to the Jedi Temple you inform Master Windu that Chancellor Palpatine is the Sith you have been looking for. He sets off at once for the Senate with several Jedi. You and Anakin follow. When you burst into the Chancellor reception Mace Windu stands over the Sith Lord pointing his lightsaber at his throat.

‘No!’ you and Anakin shout together. ‘Anakin slices away Mace Windu’s hand and a vivid bolt of blue fire throws Mace Windo through the shattered window of the chamber to fall to his death on the distant streets below.

Anakin looks down on the plummeting body as the Sith Lord gets to his feet chuckling and eying you and Anakin. You realize in a flash that their can only be one Sith apprentice!
12112221221.title: The Sith Apprentice

121122212211.content:
Laughing you stab your lightsaber right through Anakin's back and into his heart. Hs life blood spurts into the wind. He dies without seeing his killer.

Darth Sidious chuckles, 'Well done my boy, you will make a fine Sith.'

You kneel and pledge yourself to his service.

'Very well, rise Darth Vader.'
121122212211.title: Darth Vader

121122212212.content:
YOu lower your yellow blade.Despite your differences you cannot kill Anakin. Maybe you both can serve the Dark Lord.

Suddenly Anakin's body stiffens and he spins around his blue blade seperating your head from your shoulders.

He knew too, there could only be one.
121122212212.title: You are foolish to lower your defences

12112221222.content:
'Never you shout!' You raise your lightsaber to strike down the Sith Lord.

Before you can destroy the vile man you scream in agony as your a blue lightsaber is stabbed through your body.

Obviously Anakin made a different choice.
12112221222.title: Stabbed in the Back

choices: Keep your hands at your sides
12112222.content:
You jump down onto the balcony and challenge Anakin.

'What's this Anakin, am I missing something?' You say
'You will be Max' Anakin taunts lighting his saber

'Don't fight!' Padme Screams

'Let me take you to the council Anakin. There are tough times for the Jedi.They may be merciful' you emplore.

'I don't need their approval!' 'He screams 'Or yours!'
12112222.title: Confrontation

choices: Cut Anakin as he passes over you
Allow him to reach your vehicle
121122221.content:
You trigger your lightsaber just before Anakin throws his through the air.Ready for his attack you slice the handle of Anakin's lightsaber in two. It falls to the ground useless. You walk towards Anakin your yellow blade raised.

'Come with me now Anakin. The Jedi Council will decide your fate.'

In the background Padme is crying. Suddenly Anakin vaults into the air over you trying to reach your sky car.
121122221.title: Escape Gambit

1211222211.content:
Anakin falls to the deck his eyes lifeless. You realise in shock that you've killed an unarmed man. Anakin broke the Jedi code, yes, but this does not excuse your crime.

Padme screams 'You murderer!' You hear her security guards running towards the balcony.

You will spend the rest of your days on the run. Or thinking about your mistakes from a cell.
1211222211.title: On the Run

1211222212.content:
You allow Anakin to reach your vehicle. Then you hear him bang his fists on the dashboard in frustration. Laughing you hold up the ignition keys.

A sullen Anakin and Padme accompany you to the Jedi Council. Anakin is not expelled but confined to quarters for personal contemplatiuo of the force for 6 months. He accepts his punishment. When Obi-Wan returns from destroying General Grevious he is able to guide Anakin back towards the path of self-sacrifice and goodness and Anakin gains some sense of contentment.

You continue teaching your Padawan who is improving well. He will one day be a great Jedi. Weeks later Supreme Chancellor Palpatine makes his bid for power. Across the the galaxy the clones turn on their Jedi Leaders. Many are killed. You stand in the Temple side by side with Master Mace Windu and fight off the clones' attack. You then fight your way to the Senate. TO your shock you realise that the Chancellor is Darth Sidious, the Sith Lord you've been looking for.

Together you and Mace Windu defeat him. With his death the Clones fall in to dissarray and are killed or captured, or lost in the Outer Rim Territories.

The future will be a challenge, but one the Jedi, and you Master Max Raven and a reformed Anakin Skywalker,(who has just had twins!) will have a great part to play.
1211222212.title: Prevention is better then cure

121122222.content:
Anakin throws his blue lightsaber through the air. It neatly cuts your head from your shoulders.

The last thing you hear is Padme screaming.
121122222.title: Decapitation

choices: Full of droids ready to attack you
1212.content:
"What about the escape pods?", you ask the group, shouting so that your voice is heard over the 'shoosh' of the elevator, and the cracking and breaking of the ship's infrastructure around you.
Anakin and Oni-Wan look at eachother for a moment after you consider this, as though having a telepathic conversation with one another. Your gaze shifts to the Chancellor who looks perplexed at what is happening all around him.
"It could work", Obi-Wan mutters.
"As long as the ship stays more or less intact. Separatist battle cruisers always have their escape pods at the back", Anakin adds.
"Idiots", the Chancellor states under his breath, although you get the feeling that only you heard him.
The elevator harshly comes to a stop with a cracking sound, giving the impression that it may have been forced to stop. The sound of an explosion rings through the ship, putting you somewhat at unease. After a few seconds, a corresponding heavy vibration passes through the elevator, making the walls shake, and you and Obi-Wan lose your respective balances (the Chancellor stays upright because Anakin immediately goes to his side). The elevator door hasn't yet opened since the elevator became stationary and you can see from the look painted across Anakin's face that he is quickly growing impatient. The others must have been too. Anakin activates his lightsaber, and you stand and watch as the blue blade extends from his hilt before being plunged into the door. He quickly yet ever so carefully pulls his saber along the edges of the door, leaving only orange scorch marks where the cut sections of metal are still hot.
"Good thinking Anakin", Obi-Wan states as Anakin works his way around the door.
Once he has gotten the whole way round the metal door, Anakin deactivates his lightsaber, and pushed the door out of places using the force. You stand and watch as as it flies away from its frame, and immediately hear the crunching of metal against metal as the door slams into several droids who had been stood on the other side of the elevator shaft.
"This is our floor", Anakin comments as you all step out of the elevator and I to a corridor which is...
1212.title: Throwing It Out There!

choices: General Greivous....and he has Shaak Ti!

1222.content:
You quickly dispatch all the droids with your lightsaber. You glance at the wreckage as youy walk away./
"Oh, that never gets old" you say with a smile.
You turn to a computer on a wall, and open up the map.
"Alright" you say "I'm off to the-
1222.title: more droids

12222.content:
The door opens to the bridge to meet Dooku.

With your little attention span you zone out as the speech about the end of the Jedi are at hand. (must be in the evil hand book. Bore the enemy with lectures then kill them.) Dooku grips his light saber and you grab yours. you dash forward saber activated, coming blade to blade with your foe you get the felling of his hatred. Several good hits and with a slide of hand you reveal a second light saber. Getting Dooku off guard taking his hand off.
12222.title: Bridge" fight Dooku

info.brief_description: You are a Jedi and must choose between the life of a Jedi or a Sith.
info.description:
You are a Jedi Knight in the Old Republic. You can either stop the Republic from becoming the Empire or replace Anakin Skywalker as the Emperor's servant.

Anything goes with this one, just no cross-overs with other stories and keep it clean. I won't delete much.
